title: LoL Chat Bug URGENT
body:
I can't "Reconnect to chat".
It says this: 
Unknown Error
An unknown error has occurred
sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.
If you keep encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more infomation.

What do i do? 

Ive tested to see if it was my computer but when i try log into my LoL chat app it doesnt work on there either!

replies.body: Everyone on the server has it I'm pretty sure, just had a game and they all had the same problem

What's worlds got to do with it?

Worlds is in the NA server at the moment, and we're in OCE, and the other servers (i hope) don't have this issue.
And yes, this issue is only with OCE

> [{quoted}](name=LevvyLeviticus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=J1tAGbRT,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-22T06:24:07.148+0000)
>
> What's worlds got to do with it?
> 
> Worlds is in the NA server at the moment, and we're in OCE, and the other servers (i hope) don't have this issue.

The worlds tab is screwing up the client, and has been for the past couple of weeks. That's why more people are lagging in games.
well that would make sense but as of right now clubs is still down so, if the worlds tab was the problem then chat would not be fixed until worlds is over.... sigh.

You also forgot to mention the hextech bugs, the loading errors on the client, the lack of compatibility with the minions summoning mini game's sacrifice button, there is alot of errors. Even minor errors when logging onto the boards.
